rules.description: Tap CapsLock (⇪) → Escape (⎋); Hold CapsLock (⇪) → Control (⌃)
Tap Command_L (⌘) → Switch input source to English  |  短按左 Command (⌘) → 切换到英文输入法
Tap Command_R (⌘) → Switch input source to Chinese  |  短按右 Command (⌘) → 切换到中文输入法
Tap Shift_L (⇧) → Switch input source (F18)  |  短按左 Shift (⇧) → 切换输入法
Tap Shift_R (⇧) → Switch input source (F18)  |  短按右 Shift (⇧) → 切换输入法
Tap CapsLock (⇪) → Escape (⎋); Hold CapsLock (⇪) → Control (⌃)
Tap Command_L (⌘) → Switch input source to English  |  短按左 Command (⌘) → 切换到英文输入法
Tap Command_R (⌘) → Switch input source to Chinese  |  短按右 Command (⌘) → 切换到中文输入法
Tap Shift_L (⇧) → Switch input source (F18)  |  短按左 Shift (⇧) → 切换输入法
Tap Shift_R (⇧) → Switch input source (F18)  |  短按右 Shift (⇧) → 切换输入法
